scripts.dev: npm run sync:shared && concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:frontend" --names "api,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta" --kill-others
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:5300 && npm run dev --prefix apps/frontend
scripts.build:frontend: npm run sync:shared && npm run build --prefix apps/frontend
scripts.build:api: npm run sync:shared && npm run build --prefix apps/api
